comments:
Build ID: I20061214-1445

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a multi-page editor that uses add(IEditorPart, IEditorInput)
2. Open the editor


More information:
Its occurring on the following line of NavigationHistory.markHistory():
    EditorSite site = (EditorSite) (part.getEditorSite());

Here's the exception
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorSite
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.NavigationHistory$2.run(NavigationHistory.java:158)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java:35)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages(Synchronizer.java:123)

I'd suggest doing an instanceof before doing the cast.
